name: Siege of the Seabed
description:
Siege of the Seabed is a tower defense game made for the Godot Wild Jam #41.

The eels want to eat the eggs! You have to do what must be done to protect them. Guide and upgrade the creatures who can help you against their siege. 

Note: Game ends at wave 10, no new enemies spawn, there is no end screen.

Warning: When returning to the main menu, you may need to reload the page.

Controls:
Mouse only.

Wild Cards:
Sound of Y'all - All sounds in-game are made with your mouth(s).

Art and music, and sounds done by SoraIllusion
